title: Bug 114905 - Default value set in list box of report parameter lost after modifying the default value
description:
Description: When the default value is set in the list box of a report parameter, it gets lost after modifying the default value.
Steps to reproduce: 1. New a report parameter and set the Display type to List Box.
2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc' and set 'aa' as the default value, then click OK.
3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog and modify 'aa' to 'aaa', then click OK directly.
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.

Observed Behavior: No default value is set.
Expected Behavior: 'aaa' should be the default value.

Actual result: After step 5, the OK button is still usable.
